Operation Crossbow

Ano: 1965

IMDb ID: tt0059549

Classificação: 6.6

Sinopse: This is the story of the methods used to defeat Hitler's V1 (doodlebug) and V2 (rocket) "revenge weapons" towards the end of World War II. Even though the Germans were in retreat, these weapons could have turned their defeat into victory. This movie includes references to Hannah Reich, who was a German test pilot in real-life.—Steve Crook
